text: Quite packed at lunch time when I have. The restaurant give multiple levels of pricing menus, designed for different customers need. Sushi tastes better than sashimi

An absolute delight to eat there for lunch. Service was top notch, the sushi was super fresh and extremely well done and to top it all off, one of the better priced lunch set for omakase. I would highly recommend it. Probably my new go to in Singapore.

Omakase dining experience at Shinji is always so good! The quality of ingredients used, skills and talents of the chefs to make such exquisite Edo style sushi is out of this world.
Went for the Chef's special omakase on Christmas Day and we really enjoyed the food that was prepared for us by the wonderful chefs.
We were especially impressed by the long spined sea urchin uni from Hokkaido. Extremely buttery, sweet tasting with a nice hint of the sea at the end. Best uni we've ever had.
Specially for Christmas, the restaurant had also prepared a special strawberry and red bean covered by mochi dessert. The strawberry and red bean merged together in a beautiful marriage without any of them overpowering the other. The mochi wrapping everything together was perfectly made and offered a nice texture to the outer layer.
Overall enjoyed our Christmas Day lunch at Shinji very much. Thank you to all chefs and staffs of Shinji for the memorable experience.
Had the omakase for dinner and it was amazing. Dishes are super fresh and delicious. Tried puffer fish for the first time and it blew my mind. So nice!

Loved every part of it. The food had so many layers and the flavour profiles blended together so seamlessly.
It was such an experience to see the chefs take such pride in the food they were putting up.

Highly recommended!
